bio: Onlyfun is an innovative blockchain social project and content platform that brings together multiple mainchains.
contributionDescription:
Onlyfun is committed to solving the problem of user cross-chain transactions, supporting multi-chain recharge and withdrawal, and allowing users to easily switch between different blockchain networks, simplifying the user experience.
Onlyfun has opened 7 mining pools supporting the OP chain, providing users with investment options with annual yields ranging from 12% to 120%. Users can use idle funds to mine and obtain considerable returns.
Onlyfun provides users with a platform for information sharing and communication. Users can open columns to share updates and information on OP ecosystem projects. Additionally, Onlyfun's column subscriptions support OP payment, expanding the usage scenarios of OP.

contributionLinks.description: A brief introduction to Onlyfun mining pool.

impactDescription: Since its beta launch in April, Onlyfun has had over 9,000 registered users, with users publishing more than 29,000 articles in total. The amount of funds participating in mining on the platform has exceeded $1,000,000,and the total amount of mining rewards issued has exceeded $300,000.
pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Social Platform, Cross-Chain Solution, Content Creation
